column4: ok im having some more porblems extracting something to my 'user folder' something about hiddenfiles and such...anyone ready to hear my cries again lol...
hello again...can i get someones attention for a second?
i know but i did that a few times and i feel like you guys are busy and i dont want to intewrupt just wait my turn, but if thats not the etiquet sorry
ok so i am trying to open a .rar file
ok sorry i will dont wanna be a pest but if thats the style its on!
ok so im trying to unpack Conky Cronograph Station i have succesfully unarchieved it
wheni try to extract  the only thing i see on the desktop is the readme file
that is because you have chosen that file to extract?
you are chosing to unpack one file, when you should be unpacking the folder

since its not your first rodeo lets hit the finer points, you got a rar, within it is a folder, the folder may extract as a 'hidden folder' .xxxxx type, you wont see it on desktop, you will seee it with nautilus if you enter the 'desktop' folder and have the 'let me see hidden folders and files option clicked, there you go 'sport'
btw sport , start with the nick you are talking to, like at the rodeo
if you are looking at the folder than the issue is resolved, its unpacked, what you get is what is was packed
sure, the main ubuntu website, ooodles of nifty info
